articles.title: So BASIC: Bill Gates Releases Microsoft's Original Source Code - PCMag
articles.description: In the 1970s, Gates and his Microsoft co-founder, Paul Allen, used a computer in Harvard's lab to compose what he calls the 'coolest code I've written.' It's now public for the first time.
